sip.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to drink something slowly, taking very small mouthfuls
sip.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: She was sitting at the table sipping her coffee.
He sipped at his wine with pleasure.
sip.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a very small amount of a drink
sip.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: She poured more wine and took a sip.
